English newspapers are reporting that the chances of the British and Irish Lions 2021 tour of South Africa are looking bleak with a decision set to be made in February.

articles.author: Natalie Whiting
articles.title: PNG athletes desperately want to be allowed into Australia to train for the Olympics after using makeshift facilities for months - ABC News
articles.description: Papua New Guinea's Olympic Committee is writing to the Australian Government asking for its athletes to be allowed into the country to train for the six months before the Tokyo Games.
articles.content:
Just months out from the Tokyo Games, Dika Toua is lifting weights in sweltering heat underneath her coach's family's house in Papua New Guinea.
She and fellow Olympic hopeful, Morea Baru, would nor… [+8471 chars]
